title: [Health] A new Stanford study reveals how meat and dairy industry lobbying has influenced government regulations and funding to stifle competition from alternative meat products with smaller climate and environmental impacts

[Medicine] Intermittent fasting and calorie restriction change the microbiome composition in the gut, which could affect other functions in the body. Both dietary weight loss strategies are equally successful in leading to a more diverse gut microbiome, which is associated with better health and leanness.
